ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A function to estimate panel-corrected standard errors. Data may contain balanced or unbalanced panels.
A function to estimate panel-corrected standard errors. Data may contain balanced or unbalanced panels.

name: r-pcse
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.9.1.1' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-pcse
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/pcse_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/pcse/pcse_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: c8a19f898d0395a92e9215c270b1b9f338a7ebf4d98d5dd836c34db90d0969e5

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('pcse')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('pcse')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=pcse
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: A function to estimate panel-corrected standard errors. Data may contain balanced
    or unbalanced panels.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - pn-alex

# Package: pcse
# Title: Panel-Corrected Standard Error Estimation in R
# Version: 1.9.1.1
# Date: 2018-06-07
# Author: Delia Bailey <delia.bailey@gmail.com> and Jonathan N. Katz <jkatz@caltech.edu>
# Maintainer: Delia Bailey <delia.bailey@gmail.com>
# Description: A function to estimate panel-corrected standard errors. Data may contain balanced or unbalanced panels.
# License: GPL (>= 3)
# Packaged: 2018-06-07 18:47:40 UTC; delia.bailey
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-06-07 19:16:10 UTC
# NeedsCompilation: no
